FuncDef: The display domain-list command displays information about domain lists in the system.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies information about the domain list with the specified name. domain-list-name specifies the domain list name.
The name is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you use this command in the domain list view or specify a name for the domain list, the detailed configuration of the domain list is displayed; otherwise, only the summary about all existing domain lists is displayed.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
